name: Scribbled Squares
description: Assignment week one. I attempted to recreate Dialog Between Emotion and Method created by Vera Molnar. I used randomness and colors, and played with stroke weight

name: Disco Dancefloor
description: Assignment week one. An inspired version of Dialog Between Emotion and Method created by Vera Molnar. I played with randomness, strokeweights, neon colors and movement. I changed the map value in the get random value function in order to create more ordered sqaure shapes.

name: Conflicting method and emotion
description: Assignment week one. My version of Dialog Between Emotion and Method created by Vera Molnar. I used variation and reduced variance every third element. This piece reflects me being conflicted between being objective, organized and chaotic

name: Squares falling
description: Assignment week one. My attempt on Schotter by Georg Nees (1968). I started working from Grid example step 04, and then switched so the rotation occur with the y axis only. More and more rotation as the y goes further down
